    try input.toIntOption match

    catch case ex: Exception => Left(ex.getMessage)

case class WorkoutSession(durationMinutes: Int, caloriesBurned: Int)

enum WorkoutParsingError:
  case InvalidFormat, NegativeDuration, NegativeCalories

def parseWorkoutSession(str: String): Either[WorkoutParsingError, WorkoutSession] =
  str.split(",") match
    case Array(dm, cb) =>
      for
        d <- dm.toIntOption.toRight(WorkoutParsingError.InvalidFormat)
        c <- cb.toIntOption.toRight(WorkoutParsingError.InvalidFormat)
        _ <- if d >= 0 then Right(()) else Left(WorkoutParsingError.NegativeDuration)
        _ <- if c >= 0 then Right(()) else Left(WorkoutParsingError.NegativeCalories)
      yield WorkoutSession(d, c)
    case _ => Left(WorkoutParsingError.InvalidFormat)

enum ProgressCalculationError:
  case InvalidSteps, InvalidGoal

def calculateProgress(stepsStr: String, goalStr: String): Either[ProgressCalculationError, Double] =
  for
    steps <- stepsStr.toIntOption.toRight(ProgressCalculationError.InvalidSteps)
    goal <- goalStr.toIntOption.toRight(ProgressCalculationError.InvalidGoal)
    if goal > 0
  yield steps.toDouble / goal

def parseSleepMinutes(raw: Option[String]): Either[SleepParsingError, Int] =
  raw match
    case None => Left(SleepMissingField)
    case Some(v) => v.toIntOption
      .toRight(SleepNotANumber)
      .flatMap(m => if m >= 0 then Right(m) else Left(SleepNegativeDuration))

case class Product(identifier: String, stock: Int)
sealed trait InventoryError
case object ProductNotFound extends InventoryError
case object InsufficientStock extends InventoryError

def withdrawStock(products: List[Product], id: String, qty: Int): Either[InventoryError, Product] =
  products.find(_.identifier == id) match
    case Some(product) if product.stock >= qty =>
      Right(product.copy(stock = product.stock - qty))
    case Some(_) =>
      Left(InsufficientStock)
    case None =>
      Left(ProductNotFound)

case class Item(id: String, name: String, quantity: Int)

sealed trait StockError
case object OutOfStock extends StockError
case object ItemNotFound extends StockError

def reserveItem(inventory: Map[String, Item], itemId: String, qty: Int): Either[StockError, Item] =
  inventory.get(itemId) match
    case None => Left(ItemNotFound)
    case Some(item) if item.quantity < qty => Left(OutOfStock)
    case Some(item) => Right(item.copy(quantity = item.quantity - qty))

def findSkuOrNone(inventory: Map[String, Int], sku: String): Option[Int] =
  inventory.get(sku)

case class ItemRecord(id: String, available: Int)
sealed trait RetrievalError
case object RetrievalNotFound extends RetrievalError
case object RetrievalInsufficient extends RetrievalError

def retrieveItems(records: List[ItemRecord], id: String, amount: Int): Either[RetrievalError, ItemRecord] =
  records.find(_.id == id) match
    case None => Left(RetrievalNotFound)
    case Some(it) if it.available < amount => Left(RetrievalInsufficient)
    case Some(it) => Right(it.copy(available = it.available - amount))

def adjustBatchQty(batches: List[Batch], id: String, delta: Int): Either[BatchUpdateError, Batch] =

    case None => Left(BatchNotFound)
    case Some(b) if b.qty + delta < 0 => Left(BatchQtyNegative)
    case Some(b) => Right(b.copy(qty = b.qty + delta))

def redactProfanities(text: String): Option[String] =
  val words = text.split(" ")
  val profanities = Set("badword", "offensive")
  val found = words.exists(profanities.contains(_))
  if found then Some(words.map(w => if profanities.contains(w) then "***" else w).mkString(" ")) else None

def transformEnergyUnit(value: Double, from: String, to: String): Double =
  (from, to) match
    case ("kWh", "Wh") => value * 1000
    case ("Wh", "kWh") => value / 1000
    case _ => throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Unsupported energy unit")

sealed trait TallyingError
case object EmptyVoteList extends TallyingError

def computeMajority(votes: List[String]): Either[TallyingError, String] =
  if votes.isEmpty then Left(EmptyVoteList)
  else
    val grouped = votes.groupBy(identity).view.mapValues(_.size)
    grouped.maxByOption(_._2).map(_._1).toRight(InvalidVote)

def calculateSessionTime(login: String, logout: String): Int =
  try
    val start = login.toInt
    val end = logout.toInt
    if (end < start) throw new Exception("Logout before login")
    end - start
  catch
    case e: Exception => throw new Exception("Session time calculation failed: " + e.getMessage)

def parseScoreUpdate(payload: String): Either[String, (String, Int)] =
  val parts = payload.split(":")
  if parts.length == 2 && parts(1).forall(_.isDigit) then
    Right((parts(0), parts(1).toInt))
  else
    Left("Malformed score update payload")

def parseStreamScore(payload: String): Option[(String, Int)] =
  val fields = payload.split(",")
  if fields.length == 2 && fields(1).forall(_.isDigit) then
    Some((fields(0), fields(1).toInt))
  else None

  if parts.length == 2 && parts(1).forall(_.isDigit) then
    Right(LiveEvent(parts(0), parts(1).toInt))
  else Left(EventMalformed)

  else
